name: Cheers Interactive (I) Pvt. Ltd.
tag_list: patent, patent-research, patent-analytics, patentability, invalidation, infringement, freedom-to-operate, landscape, ip-asset-management
overview:
Cheers Interactive is a specialist Research & Analytical Company based out of India and UK. They provide Consistent high quality patent services in the field of electronic, telecommunications, mechanical, pharmaceutical, biotechnology, life sciences, food technology and many more.

They specialize in Patent Search, Analysis, Landscape, Monitoring and IP Asset Management services. their technical and business intelligence platform consists of dynamic reports and client customized reporting tools for patent, non-patent, business, market and other technical and competitive information in a single platform.
